complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Fix iOS map marker-tile synchronization during scrolling
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the task 'Fix iOS map marker-tile synchronization during scrolling' into detailed subtasks covering: auditing and consolidating Safari-specific CSS/JS fixes; aligning markers and tiles on the same GPU/compositor layer; adjusting backface-visibility and transform settings; implementing and verifying invalidateSize calls; creating a cross-device test plan for real iOS devices; and documenting changes and performance metrics.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires deep debugging of WebKit optimizations, CSS transforms, GPU layers, and extensive real-device testing across multiple scrolling scenarios, making it moderately complex.
